product_name: Thule Pack 'n Pedal Basic Handlebar Bag
long_description: Compact and waterproof, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Basic Handlebar Bag protects important items from the weather while you ride and keeps them close at hand. Designed for use with the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Handlebar Mount (sold separately). Thule Pack 'n Pedal Handlebar Bag has a 9-liter capacity and features a waterproof, roll-top design to keep contents dry. Integrated loop allows for safety light attachment to the front of the bag. Built-in reflective fabric increases visibility when night riding. Roll-top closure doubles as a convenient carrying handle.
short_description: Compact and waterproof, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Basic Handlebar Bag protects important items from the weather while you ride and keeps them close at hand.
